name: Introduction to Mathematical Logic

prerequisites: MAT223H1/MATA23H3/MAT223H5/MAT240H1/MAT240H5, MAT235Y1/MAT235Y5/(MATB41H3, MATB42H3)/MAT237Y1/(MATB41H3, MATB42H3, MATB43H3)/MAT237Y5, MAT246H1/CSC236H1/CSC240H1 (These Prerequisites will be waived for students who have MAT257Y1)
